title: neekEla naiyeDa
sahitya:
nIkEla nAyeDa nitsalamu nirjaruDau raghu rAmAbhirAma

anupallavi

 sAkEta puramuna velayu shrI sArvabhauma ninnE caraNamanaka

caraNam

 kAmAri hrdaya vihAra jagatkAraka vanamAlyAnanda svarUpa
sAmirInuta sArasAkSa vara sAdhu samrakSaka shrInivAsa 




ciTTai Swaram
